Name: Agentin AI
Headline: AI Agents that automate enterprise software processes
Description: At Agentin AI, we build Agents that move data and take actions across enterprise systems, like Salesforce, NetSuite and SAP. These agents are difficult to build because each enterprise heavily customizes their systems but we solved that by training our Agents to learn and adapt from failures, applying reinforcement learning techniques we developed.

Active_Founders.Name: Sankeerth Rao Karingula, Founder
Active_Founders.Description:
ex-Google Deepmind researcher with a PhD in Machine Learning from UC San Diego and undergrad in EE from IIT Bombay. 

At Agentin AI, we build Agents that move data and take actions across enterprise systems, like Salesforce and SAP. These agents are difficult to build because each enterprise heavily customizes their systems but we solved that by training our Agents to learn and adapt from failures, applying Reinforcement Learning techniques we developed.

generated_description:
**Agentin AI: Revolutionizing Enterprise Automation**

Agentin AI, founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator's W25 batch, is on a mission to transform how businesses handle software processes. Based in the heart of San Francisco, this nimble two-person team is tackling the complexities of integrating enterprise systems like Salesforce, NetSuite, and SAP, making automation more accessible and effective.

The crux of Agentin AI’s offering lies in their specialized AI Agents that automate the Order to Cash (O2C) process. These agents are designed to navigate significant customization in enterprise software, using reinforcement learning to adapt and improve their performance over time. Simply put, they learn from failures, which is a game-changer in a space where traditional integrations can take months and can come with a slew of manual errors.

Their O2C solution connects orders, contracts, and payments seamlessly across platforms, reducing the typical cycle time from 45 days to just 18 days, and slashing manual touchpoints by a staggering 83%. This is what we like to call “enterprise-grade automation.” Imagine a world where your AI is not just processing data but also validating it with near-perfect accuracy (99.9% for order creation) and handling risk assessments in real-time, speeding up approvals significantly.

Agentin AI is not just about decreasing errors; it’s about making integrations simple and automatic. With their AI agents performing over 450 O2C tasks autonomously, the focus shifts from tedious manual input to strategic decision-making. They promise an integration turnaround of just 2-3 weeks, compared to the traditional 4-6 months, alongside self-optimizing models that require no manual updates as the system evolves.

With collaborations already underway with major players like SAP and Salesforce, and more integrations on the horizon (NetSuite and Microsoft Dynamics expected soon), Agentin AI is constructing a robust ecosystem that promises to elevate how enterprises operate.

If you’re intrigued by the prospect of significantly reducing your operational overhead and errors while improving efficiency, Agentin AI is opening its platform for early access through a beta waitlist, and they're available for demos to showcase their capabilities.

In short, whether you're struggling with software integrations or just looking to streamline your enterprise workflows, Agentin AI might just be the partner you’ve been waiting for—embedded in the new era of technological efficiency.

For more details, visit their website: [www.agentin.ai](https://www.agentin.ai). And if you want to see it in action, don’t hesitate to book a demo.
